meanings.definition: Release an egg from the ovary.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how women ovulate each month.
meanings.sent3: The hen seemed to ovulate right on time every day.
meanings.sent4: The flowers ovulate their seeds in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The ovulating fish attracted many predators.

meanings.sent2: It is important for a woman to ovulate for fertility.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that even the monkeys ovulate.
meanings.sent4: The earth seems to ovulate with the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The ovulating birds sang joyfully in the morning.
